step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Keep your fingers open as instructed.
You're stretching your arm overhead well. Ensure your fingers remain open throughout this phase.
Great fist and shoulder blade squeeze! Remember to inhale as you tighten your muscles.
Nice extension back overhead. Exhale and relax your muscles as you return.
You're doing well. Continue to focus on controlled movements and breathing.
Second rep starting strong! Maintain that comfortable posture and open fingers.
Good overhead stretch. Keep those fingers open and focus on the movement.
Excellent fist and shoulder squeeze. Remember to inhale deeply during this tightening phase.
Well done returning overhead. Exhale and relax as you complete the movement.
You've completed the exercise! Focus on smooth transitions and controlled breathing for best results.

exercise_summary: You've completed the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fingers open when stretching overhead and make a tight fist while squeezing your shoulder blades together. Inhale as you tighten and exhale as you relax. Great job!
